charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1101_0100:
As [Name:PlayerNickname ] was strolling
through the forest, [EN:Gen Ref="255" M="he" F="she" ] found Dawn talking to
a Lotad.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_0200: Hey there, little fella. Where’d you come from?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0401_0500:
Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It looks like
this Lotad is lost.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0401_0600:
Its Trainer must be worried sick! We gotta
find them!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0402_0800:
Oh, hey, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! It looks like
this Lotad is lost.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0402_0900:
Its Trainer must be worried sick! We gotta
find them!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1000:
But...it looks a little under the weather.
What’s wrong, buddy?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1100:
Wait! Maybe you’re thirsty! Here, take some of
my water!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1200:
How was that? Good? Oh, thank goodness!
Here, I’ll water your leaf, too!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1300:
There you go! All better! OK, let’s go find
your Trainer!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1400: Yay! I can’t believe we found its Trainer so fast!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1500:
Thank you, thank you so much! And you even
gave him water, too! Oh, thank you!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_1700:
Don’t worry about it. It was my pleasure!
Now, Lotad, don’t you go wandering off
again, OK?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0301_1800: That was really nice of you.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0402_2100:
Hehehe! But that really wasn’t anything
special, y’know. ♪
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_2200:
If somebody’s in trouble, you help them.
It’s only natural!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_2300: Oh! Sorry, Turtwig. Were you thirsty, too?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_2400: Hang on, I’ll give you some water...
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_2500:
Wait! I just remembered! I gave that Lotad the last
of my water!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_2600:
I’m so sorry, Turtwig. We’ll head back to the
Pokémon Center right away. Can you hold out
until then?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0301_2700: Here, take some of my water!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0401_2800:
You’re...sharing your water with us?
Well, I won’t say no to that.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0402_3000:
You’re...sharing your water with us?
Well, I won’t say no to that.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3300:
Thank you so much, [Name:PlayerNickname ]!
You really helped us out!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3400: Turtwig love water as much as Lotad do.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3500:
When they get thirsty, the leaves on their heads
start to wilt.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3600:
That’s why I always have water with me, but
unfortunately I only brought one canteen today.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3700:
I’m pretty good in a Pokémon battle, but
when it comes to anything else, I can be a
little scatterbrained.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3800:
So, somebody else usually ends up having to
bail me out.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_3900: Just like how you gave us some of your water!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0401_4100: Thanks! But you know, I’ve always been like this...
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_0402_4300: Thanks! But you know, I’ve always been like this...
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_4400:
And I’ve always thought that people and Pokémon
aren’t meant to go through life alone.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_4500:
That’s why I make it a point to help others when
they’re in trouble!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_4600: So, if you ever need a helping hand, I’m your gal!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_4700:
Besides, I’ve got a bit more experience than you
as a Trainer, so I’m sure I can teach you a few
things, too!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_5200:
Phew! There she is! Wait, what does she have in
her mouth? Is that...my canteen? Why does she
have my...
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_5300:
Oh! I must have been so focused on finding that
Lotad’s Trainer, I didn’t even notice that I had
dropped it.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_5400:
Classic me, right, Turtwig? What would I do
without you?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_5500:
A-anyway, like I was saying, we gotta help each
other out as much as we can!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2301_1201_5600:
’Cause if you do good, good will always come
back to you. Know what I mean?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_1201_0100:
Aaah... Feel that breeze on your face! It’s not
exactly the same as the wind in Alola, but it still
feels great!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_1201_0200:
Oh yeah! I never asked what’s it like where
you’re from.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_1201_0400:
I suppose it gets colder than other regions, and the
weather can get pretty intense, too. We get snow,
volcanic ash, and everything in between!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_1201_0500: Whoa! That cold, huh? Sinnoh sounds wild!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_1201_0600:
I wonder if a Trainer battles differently depending
on whether they’re from a warm region or a cold
region. Let’s test it out!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_0501_0100:
That was awesome! I think I kinda understand
Sinnoh’s vibe a little better now!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_0501_0200:
I had so much fun, too! I could practically feel the
Alolan breeze blowing through my hair!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2311_0501_0400: Oh, you’re evolving! I’m so proud of you, Turtwig!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_1201_0100: Oh, my gosh! You’re Plumeria, aren’t you?!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_1201_0200: Huh? Do I know you? What do you want?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_1201_0300:
I’ve heard all about you! Everyone says you’re like
a super-cool big sister!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_1201_0400:
I’d love to know more about you! Could you have
a Pokémon battle with me?
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_1201_0500:
You’re rarin’ to go, aren’t you? All right, I can
throw down.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_0101_0100: But you’d better be ready for this!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_0501_0100: You’re not too bad. That was fun.
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_0501_0200:
I can’t believe I just got a compliment from
Plumeria! I’m so happy right now!
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_0501_0300: Huh? Grotle, are you about to...
charaepi_ch0116_00_hikari/2312_0501_0400:
Looks like your partner is gonna get
even stronger!
